lines.text: I love you more than anything else I have ever felt or known. It doesn't matter what I do because if it's with you, then I know I'm successful. I love you and I just wanna be with you.
Last time I drank I forgot to stop for about ten years.

[after dropping a case of beer]
I should've gotten light beer.
For everything that's lovely is but a brief, dreamy, kind of delight. Yeats.
That's Craig? What is *he* doing here?
